on reading compounds: 白【ハク】white, striped mullet fry (Mugil cephalus), speech, one's lines, white dragon tile, winning hand with a pung (or kong) of white dragon tiles, white person, Caucasian, Belgium
白衣【ハクイ】white robe, (doctor's) white gown
太白【タイハク】Venus (planet), thick silk thread, refined sugar, white rice jelly, variety of sweet potato
白衣【ハクイ】white robe, (doctor's) white gown
白夜【ビャクヤ】night under the midnight sun, white night (at extreme latitudes), night during which the sun doesn't set
kun reading compounds: 白【しろ】white, innocence, innocent person, blank space, white go stone, white dragon tile, skewered grilled pig intestine
蘿蔔【すずしろ】daikon (variety of large white Oriental radish, Raphanus sativus var. longipinnatus) (primarily used in context of the seven spring herbs)
白石【しろいし】white stone, white (go pieces)
